    • Jan 12, 2018 - 修改mysql默认密码 并且解决Can’t connect to local MySQL 问题

    1. mysql stop

    2. mysqld_safe –user=mysql –skip-grant-tables –skip-networking &

    3. mysql -u root mysql

    4. update user set authentication_string=password(‘root’) where user=’root’;

    5. flush privileges;

    6. unset TMPDIR

    7. mysql_install_db –verbose –user=`whoami` –basedir=”$(brew –prefix mysql)” –datadir=/usr/local/var/mysql

    如果这一步提示 /usr/local/var/mysql 已经存在，先无情rm掉

    1. mysql.server start

    2. mysql -uroot -proot 进去啦！！

    Dec 14, 2017 - curl常用命令

    模拟队列插入 curl -d ‘{“id”:853098,”event”:”update”,”timestamp”:1463641228622}’ ‘http://nydus.tj.a.ajkdns.com/publish?tunnel=service.internal.community&routingKey=service.internal.community.data_change’

    上传图片 curl -F”file=@/Users/gongchangyou/Downloads/wKhzR1FmuQ-jPj0qAAGMNl9gujE083.jpg” ‘http://upd1.anjuke.com/upload’

    Nov 30, 2017 - sublime常用命令

    批量修改
    1. command + F 搜索字符串
    2. alt + enter 批量选中

    编译配置

    /Users/gongchangyou/Library/Application Support/Sublime Text 2/Packages/User

    g++ -std=c++11 delete_image.cpp -o delete_image -lopenapi_protobuf -L.
